name: The Cat Race
description:
The Cat Race is a small cute game with great atmosphere, where you buy items, and compete in races to become the best cat racer of all time!

Includes  a race system, and a shop system

Created By Wyatt Bradshaw And Ushearr

Coded, Designed, Drawn by  Wyatt Bradshaw

Credits go to Ushearr for all music in the game

Created for the Mini Jam 127
